article_text: The Best Times, a publication for those 60 and older, sparks controversy with an article under the headline “Kansas on the road to eliminating Medicare?”

article_metadata.title: Article on possible Medicare change in Kansas draws a rebuttal from lawmakers | The Kansas City Star
